title: MAG 089 - Twice as Bright Transcript
text:
el? 
JUDE 
I guess Mike is normally short for Michael, yeah? 
ARCHIVIST 
Corridors, weird limbs, laughs like a… headache? 
JUDE 
What? No. He’s pale, got a big, weird scar. Smells of, um… 
ARCHIVIST 
Oh, ozone! 
JUDE 
Yeah, that’s the one. Hangs around with the Fairchilds sometimes. 

The Magnus Archives – MAG089 – Twice as Bright 
18 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Michael Crew. 
JUDE 
That’s him. I know where you can find him. 
ARCHIVIST 
Where? 
JUDE 
Not for free. 
ARCHIVIST 
Okay. What do you want? 
JUDE 
Oh, nothing much. Just shake my hand. 
ARCHIVIST 
W-What? 
JUDE 
You hurt my feelings earlier. I want you to shake my hand. Come on. It won’t 
hurt. 
ARCHIVIST 
Fine. 
[The sound of something burning.] 

The Magnus Archives – MAG089 – Twice as Bright 
19 
 
JUDE 
I lied. 
(The Archivist screams in pain.) 
[The tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
